root.name: Jimmie Johnson's Anything with an Engine
root.description: GameplayAs the title suggests engines aren't solely confined to cars. They can be strapped to shopping carts, dumpsters, lawnmowers, and others that don't typically go over 100mph. The game will feature weapons, similar in fashion to Mario Kart. 4 players can play locally and 8 can play online.2011 Zippo 200 at the GlenJimmie in the number 7 Anything with an Engine ChevyOn August 13th Jimmie drove the number 7 Chevrolet in the Nationwide series at the Zippo 200 at the Glen, with the game as his sponsor, for JR Motorsports; a team owned by his Sprint Cup teammate Dale Earnhardt Jr. He finished in 2nd place.
